data.title: Profiles: Württemberg Rulers and Consorts
data.meta_description: Kings of Württemberg Friedrich I Duchess Augusta of Brunswick-Wolfenbüttel Charlotte, Princess Royal of Great Britain Wilhelm I Princess Caroline Augusta of Bavaria Grand Duchess Catherine Pavlovna…
data.text:
Kings of Württemberg

Friedrich I

Duchess Augusta of Brunswick-Wolfenbüttel

Charlotte, Princess Royal of Great Britain

Wilhelm I

Princess Caroline Augusta of Bavaria

Grand Duchess Catherine Pavlovna of Russia

Duchess Pauline Therese of Württemberg

Karl I

Grand Duchess Olga Nikolaevna of Russia

Wilhelm II

Princess Marie of Waldeck-Pyrmont

Princess Charlotte of Schaumburg-Lippe

Pretenders to the Throne

Albrecht, Duke of Württemberg

Philipp Albrecht, Duke of Württemberg

Carl, Duke of Württemburg

Friedrich I

Full Name: Friedrich Wilhelm Karl

Titles: His Majesty The King of Württemberg

Born: November 6, 1754, in Treptow, Poland

Parents: Friedrich II, Duke of Württemberg and Sophia Dorothea of Brandenburg-Schwedt

Married(1): October 15, 1780, to Duchess Augusta of Brunswick-Wolfenbüttel

Children:

– King Wilhelm I (1781)

– Princess Catharina, Queen of Westphalia (1783)

– Princess Sophia Dorothea (1783)

– Prince Paul (1785)

Married(2): May 18, 1797, to Charlotte, Princess Royal of Great Britain

Reign: January 1, 1806 – October 30, 1816

Died: October 30, 1816, Stuttgart

Burial Site: Royal Crypt, Palace Chapel, Ludwigsburg Palace

Unofficial Royalty: Friedrich I, King of Württemberg

Augusta of Brunswick-Wolfenbüttel

Full Name: Augusta Caroline Friederika Luise

Titles: Her Royal Highness The Princess Württemberg

Born: December 3, 1764 in Brunswick

Parents: Carl Wilhelm, Duke of Brunswick and Princess Augusta of Great Britain

Married: October 15, 1780, to the future King Friedrich I

Children:

– King Wilhelm I (1781)

– Princess Catharina, Queen of Westphalia (1783)

– Princess Sophia Dorothea (1783)

– Prince Paul (1785)

Died: September 27, 1788, Lohde Castle, Estonia

Burial Site: St John’s Church in Kullamaa, Estonia

Unofficial Royalty: Augusta of Brunswick-Wolfenbüttel, Princess Friedrich of Württemberg

Charlotte, Princess Royal

Full Name: Charlotte Augusta Matilda

Titles: Her Majesty The Queen of Württemberg

Born: September 29, 1766, Buckingham House, London

Parents: King George III of Great Britain and Charlotte of Mecklenburg-Strelitz

Married: May 18, 1797, to the future King Friedrich I

Died: October 5, 1828, Ludwigsburg Palace

Burial Site: Royal Crypt, Palace Chapel, Ludwigsburg Palace

Unofficial Royalty: Charlotte, Princess Royal, Queen of Württemberg

Wilhelm I

Full Name: Wilhelm Friedrich Karl

Titles: His Majesty The King of Württemberg

Born: September 27, 1781, in Lüben, Poland

Parents: King Friedrich I and Augusta of Brunswick-Wolfenbüttel

Married(1): June 8, 1808, in Munich, to Princess Caroline Augusta of Bavaria (div. 1814)

Married(2): January 24, 1816, in St Petersburg, to Grand Duchess Catherine Pavlovna of Russia

Children:

– Princess Marie, Countess of Neipperg (1816)

– Princess Sophie, Queen of the Netherlands (1818)

Married(3): April 15, 1820, in Stuttgart, to Duchess Pauline Therese of Württemberg

Children:

– Princess Catherine (1821)

– King Karl I (1823)

– Princess Augusta, Princess of Saxe-Weimar-Eisenach (1826)

Reign: October 30, 1816 – June 25, 1864

Died: June 25, 1864, Schloss Rosenstein, Stuttgart

Burial Site: Württemberg Mausoleum, Stuttgart

Unofficial Royalty: Wilhelm I, King of Württemberg

Princess Caroline Augusta of Bavaria

Full Name: Karoline Auguste

Titles: Her Royal Highness The Crown Princess of Württemberg

Born: February 8, 1792, Bavaria

Parents: King Maximilian I of Bavaria and Augusta Wilhelmine of Hesse-Darmstadt

Married(1): June 8, 1808, in Munich, to the future King Wilhelm I(div. 1814)

Married(2): October 29, 1816, to Emperor Franz I of Austria

Died: February 9, 1873, Salzburg

Burial Site: Imperial Crypt, Vienna

Unofficial Royalty: Caroline Augusta of Bavaria, Crown Princess of Württemberg

Grand Duchess Catherine Pavlovna of Russia

Full Name: Ekaterina Pavlovna

Titles: Her Majesty The Queen of Württemberg

Born: May 10, 1788, Catherine Palace, Tsarskoye Selo, Russia

Parents: Tsar Paul I of Russia and Princess Sophie Dorothea of Württemberg

Married(1): August 3, 809, in Russia, to Duke George of Oldenburg

Children:

– Duke Alexander Georgievich of Oldenburg (1810)

– Duke Peter Georgievich of Oldenburg (1812)

Married(2): January 24, 1816, in St Petersburg, to the future King Wilhelm I

Children:

– Princess Marie, Countess of Neipperg (1816)

– Princess Sophie, Queen of the Netherlands (1818)

Died: January 9, 1819, Stuttgart

Burial Site: Württemberg Mausoleum, Stuttgart

Unofficial Royalty: Ekaterina Pavlovna of Russia, Queen of Württemberg

Duchess Pauline Therese of Württemberg

Full Name: Pauline Therese Luise

Titles: Her Majesty The Queen of Württemberg

Born: September 4, 1800, in Riga, Latvia

Parents: Duke Louis of Württemberg and Henriette of Nassau-Weilburg

Married: April 15, 1820, in Stuttgart, to King Wilhelm I

Children:

– Princess Catherine (1821)

– King Karl I (1823)

– Princess Augusta, Princess of Saxe-Weimar-Eisenach (1826)

Died: March 10, 1873, Stuttgart

Burial Site: Royal Crypt, Palace Chapel, Ludwigsburg Palace

Unofficial Royalty: Pauline of Württemberg, Queen of Württemberg

Karl I

Full Name: Karl Friedrich Alexander

Titles: His Majesty The King of Württemberg

Born: March 6, 1823, in Stuttgart

Parents: King Wilhelm I and Duchess Pauline Therese of Württemberg

Married: July 13, 1846, at the Peterhof Palace, St Petersburg to Grand Duchess Olga Nikolaevna of Russia

Reign: June 25, 1864 – October 6, 1891

Died: October 6, 1891, Stuttgart

Burial Site: Schlosskirche at the Old Castle, Stuttgart

Unofficial Royalty: Karl I, King of Württemberg

Grand Duchess Olga Nikolaevna of Russia

Full Name: Olga Nikolaevna

Titles: Her Majesty The Queen of Württemberg

Born: September 11, 1822, in St Petersburg, Russia

Parents: Tsar Nicholas I and Princess Charlotte of Prussia

Married: July 13, 1846 at the Peterhof Palace, St Petersburg to King Karl I

Died: October 30, 1892, Friedrichshafen

Burial Site: Schlosskirche at the Old Castle, Stuttgart

Unofficial Royalty: Olga Nikolaevna of Russia, Queen of Württemberg

Wilhelm II

Full Name: Wilhelm Karl Paul Heinrich Friedrich

Titles: His Majesty The King of Württemberg

Born: February 25, 1848, in Stuttgart

Parents: Prince Friedrich of Württemberg and Princess Catherine of Württemberg

Married(1): February 15, 1877, to Princess Marie of Waldeck and Pyrmont

Children:

– Princess Pauline, Princess of Wied (1877)

– Prince Ulrich (1880)

– stillborn daughter (1882)

Married(2): April 8, 1886, to Princess Charlotte of Schaumburg-Lippe

Reign: October 30, 1891 – November 30 1918 (abdicated)

Died: October 2, 1921 at Schloss Bebenhausen

Burial Site: Old Cemetery on the grounds of Ludwigsburg Palace

Unofficial Royalty: Wilhelm II, King of Württemberg

Princess Marie of Waldeck and Pyrmont

Full Name: Georgine Henriette Marie

Titles: Her Royal Highness Princess Wilhelm of Württemberg

Born: May 23, 1857, in Arolsen, Waldeck and Pyrmont

Parents: George Victor, Prince of Waldeck and Pyrmont and Princess Helena of Nassau

Married: February 15, 1877, to Princess Marie of Waldeck and Pyrmont

Children:

– Princess Pauline, Princess of Wied (1877)

– Prince Ulrich (1880)

– stillborn daughter (1882)

Died: April 30, 1882 at Ludwigsburg Palace

Burial Site: Old Cemetery on the grounds of Ludwigsburg Palace

Unofficial Royalty: Marie of Waldeck and Pyrmont, Princess Wilhelm of Württemberg

Princess Charlotte of Schaumburg-Lippe

Full Name: Charlotte Marie Ida Luise Hermine Mathilde

Titles: Her Majesty The Queen of Württemberg

Born: October 10, 1864 at Ratibořice Château, Bohemia (now Česká Skalice in the Czech Republic)

Parents: Prince Wilhelm of Schaumburg-Lippe and Princess Bathildis of Anhalt-Dessau

Married: April 8, 1886 to the future King Wilhelm II of Württemberg

Died: July 16, 1946, at Schloss Bebenhausen

Burial Site: Old Cemetery on the grounds of Ludwigsburg Palace

Unofficial Royalty: Charlotte of Schaumburg-Lippe, Queen of Württemberg

Albrecht, Duke of Württemberg

Full Name: Albrecht Maria Alexander Philipp Joseph

Titles: Albrecht Herzog von Württemberg; by courtesy – His Royal Highness, The Duke of Württemberg

Born: December 23, 1865, Vienna

Parents: Duke Philipp of Württemberg and Archduchess Maria Theresa of Austria

Married: January 24, 1893, to Archduchess Margarete Sophie of Austria

Children:

– Philipp Albrecht, Duke of Württemberg (1893)

– Duke Albrecht Eugen (1895)

– Duke Karl Alexander (1896)

– Duchess Amalia (1897)

– Duchess Theresa (1898)

– Duchess Elisabeth (1899)

– Duchess Margarita (1902)

Pretender: October 2, 1921 – October 31, 1939

Died: October 31, 1939, Altshausen Castle

Burial Site: Schlosskirche, Altshausen

Unofficial Royalty: Albrecht, Duke of Württemberg

Wikipedia: Archduchess Margarete Sophie of Austria

Philipp Albrecht, Duke of Württemberg

Full Name: George Philipp Albrecht Carl Maria Joseph Ludwig Hubertus Stanislaus Leopold

Titles: Philipp Albrecht Herzog von Württemberg; by courtesy – His Royal Highness, The Duke of Württemberg

Born: November 14, 1893, Stuttgart

Parents: Albrecht, Duke of Württemberg and Archduchess Margarete Sophie of Austria

Married(1): October 24, 1923, to Archduchess Helena of Austria, Princess of Tuscany

Children:

– Duchess Maria Christina, Princess Georg of Liechtenstein (1924)

Married(2): August 1, 1928, to Archduchess Rosa of Austria, Princess of Tuscany

Children:

– Duchess Helene, Margravine Pallavicini (1929)

– Duke Ludwig Albrecht (1930)

– Duchess Elisabeth, Princess Antoine of Bourbon-Two Sicilies (1933)

– Duchess Marie Therese, Duchesse de Montpensier (1934)

– Carl, Duke of Württemberg (1936)

Pretender: October 31, 1939 – April 17, 1975

Died: April 17, 1975, Ravensburg

Burial Site: Schlosskirche, Altshausen

Unofficial Royalty: Philipp Albrecht, Duke of Württemberg

Wikipedia: Archduchess Helena of Austria

Wikipedia: Archduchess Rosa of Austria

Carl, Duke of Württemberg

Head of the House of Württemberg

Full Name: Carl Maria Peter Ferdinand Philipp Albrecht Joseph Michael Pius Konrad Ulrich

Titles: Carl Herzog von Württemberg; by courtesy – His Royal Highness, The Duke of Württemberg

Born: August 1, 1936 in Friedrichshafen

Parents: Philipp Albrecht, Duke of Württemberg and Archduchess Rosa of Austria, Princess of Tuscany

Married: July 21, 1960, to Princess Diane of Orléans

Children:

– Friedrich, Hereditary Duke of Württemberg (1961)

– Duchess Mathilde (1962)

– Duke Eberhard (1963)

– Duke Philipp (1964)

– Duke Michael (1965)

– Duchess Eleonore Fleur (1977)

Pretender: April 17, 1975 – present
